attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is horrible and works terribly. It glitched my whole phone I just wanted to support our president but it glitched and broke my phone now I have to get a new one so terrible.

attributes.title: What a maroon.
attributes.review: No trump supporters use this app.  Jitterbug phones cannot handle the propaganda load.  Mostly, they are old and use the ole corded kitchen wall phone.  They think masks are stupid and their rights are more important than yours.  Remember, trump’s doctors were surprised he “aced” his cognitive test that a child could pass.  Bread GOOD!  Fire BAAAAD!

attributes.title: It sucked overall
attributes.review: I thought it was an app to vote for the best v*brator but it was actually some kind of app for a large orange, excuse me, a small mini corn dog sized p*nis. This orange d*ck app didn’t work and for that reason I am putting one star ;)

attributes.title: Trump4Prison2024
attributes.review: This is the worst app in the world. I was just walking my fish while it was raining in my room. And all of a sudden trump was asking for the remote for the jolly ranchers that stuck on the ceiling i have all ideas for kanye.

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: So this took an entire week to download and when it finally finished it made a loud ringing noise that wouldn’t stop while I was driving so I wrecked because it caught me off guard. So now I’ve been in the hospital for 2 weeks and I also got the coronavirus. I do not recommend. Garbage app. It might be cursed.

attributes.title: Don’t skip 😎
attributes.review: This app is sooooooo horrible 😡It doesn’t work right and it literally took so long to download- 400 days in fact. When i actually downloaded it started playing voices and started to try to seduce me. Let me make something REALLY clear, i do not want that orange man. 💞 I would appreciate it if he didn’t try to invite me to his cult everyday ALL day. I need a break every now and again , i am a newly single mom with a hemorrhoid and could use some relief from the constant abuse from that orange man thank you ❤️🧚🏽🧚🏽
